Play.Header: DAL wins toss, elects to Receive, and WAS elects to defend the North goal.
6-S.Suisham kicks 60 yards from WAS 30 to DAL 10. 19-M.Austin to DAL 38 for 28 yards (6-S.Suisham). Return left side of the field.
Dallas Cowboys at 15:00, (1st play from scrimmage 14:55)

(12:58) (Shotgun) 9-T.Romo FUMBLES (Aborted) at WAS 34, recovered by DAL-21-J.Jones at WAS 34. 21-J.Jones to WAS 33 for 1 yard (59-L.Fletcher). Snap bounced off Romo's helmet and into Jones arms.
(11:33) (Field Goal formation) 6-N.Folk 51 yard field goal is No Good, Wide Right, Center-91-L.Ladouceur, Holder-14-B.Johnson.
